ygData.messageBody:
At 03:47 PM 9/22/99 -0600, you wrote:
>From: "Frank Hartmann" <FRANHART@...>
>
>I consistently read all over the net how members of certain melee classes
>are sick and tired of having to go on 4 or 5 zone spanning runs to get back
>to their body. Who are these folks kidding? The only zone that is 4 zones
>away from a bind point is Nagafen's Lair. (Nag's Lair->Solusk
>A->Lavastorm->Nektulos->Neriak Foreign Quarter.)
>
>All of the other zones in the world are usually only 2, sometimes 3, zones
>away from a bind point. Is it just that folks aren't aware what the
>bind-able zones are? Or maybe good aligned characters don't realize they can
>be bound in evil cities just like good cities? Is a two zone run THAT bad?

Okay, I challenge you.
Get bound in Erudin at 3am EST.
Or Arena for that matter.
And what do you do if a guard has been trained to the entrance of the evil
city you are bound in?

Talies (who has tried to get bound in Freeport during primetime, and waited
an hour.)
